thread.title: Emmy Awards 2015: Game of Thrones leads with 24 nominations
thread.title_full: Emmy Awards 2015: Game of Thrones leads with 24 nominations - Telegraph

author: Telegraph reporters
title: Emmy Awards 2015: Game of Thrones leads with 24 nominations
text: The nominations for the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards were announced at 4.30pm UK time from the Pacific Design Center, Los Angeles, California. Among the shows nominated in the drama categories were Game of Thrones , Netflix -original series House of Cards , and Mad Men , whose final season aired in May this year. The comedy series nominess included Amazon Prime's Transparent , Armando Iannucci's sharp political satire Veep and hardy perennial Modern Family. Revealing the nominations were actress Uzo Aduba, who received a Best Supporting Actress in a Drama Series nod for Orange is the New Black , and English presenter Cat Deeley, who'll be in the running to win Outstanding Host for a Reality or Reality-Competition Programme come September. Cat Deeley will be announcing the nominees for the 2015 Emmy Awards, alongside Orange is the New Black actress Uzo Aduba (Photo: Evan Agostini/Invision/AP) The award ceremony takes place on 20 September, and will be hosted by comedian and Emmy-nomination collector Andy Samberg. See the nominations in full below.
